title: Community of Practice-Based Continuous Professional Development Program for Healthcare and Social Welfare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Core theories in healthcare and social welfare, along with practical field experience
context.additional_context: A continuous professional development program for working professionals, focusing on practical skills. Based on Communities of Practice (CoP) theory, it combines small-group collaboration and simulation-based learning to enhance competencies applicable to real work environments.

learning_goals: Through community of practice small-group learning, they can derive and implement at least three collaborative strategies to solve practical problems in healthcare and social welfare.
They can perform expert communication and role-allocation scenarios in simulation/VR environments with over 80% accuracy.
They can present two or more actionable improvement plans to apply learned content to real-world work settings through action plan development and feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
